import React from 'react' import './tours-cards.css'; import { Card, CardBody} from 'reactstrap'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; const TourCard = ({tour}) => { const {id ,title ,city ,photo ,price ,featured ,avgRating ,reviews } = tour; return (
Featured
{city} {avgRating}{" "} ({reviews.length})
{title}
${price} /per person
) } export default TourCard {/** 52.53 */}
